code_snippet:
import subprocess

# If pandoc is available, convert the markdown README to REstructured Text.
try:
    pandoc = subprocess.Popen(["pandoc", "-t", "rst", "README.md"],
                              stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
                              stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
    long_description, _ = pandoc.communicate()
    long_description = long_description.decode("utf-8")
except OSError:
    long_description = None

mapped_sequence.description: Spawns new process to execute command without shell access
Reads all bytes from process standard output

import subprocess

try:
    pandoc = subprocess.Popen(["pandoc", "-t", "rst", "README.md"],
                              stdout=subprocess.PIPE,
                              stderr=subprocess.PIPE)
    long_description, _ = pandoc.communicate()
    long_description = long_description.decode("utf-8")
except OSError:
    long_description = None
